title: I really enjoy playing assassins
body: Especially when I can never kill the adc 1v1

replies.body: you enjoy playing kogmaw?

I had a shock of my life yesterday, {{champion:11}} {{item:1419}} {{item:3124}} {{item:3139}} {{item:3071}} {{item:3111}} with 3 fire drakes on rank 3 ult, got facetanked by a {{champion:21}} {{item:3153}} {{item:3006}} {{item:3046}} {{item:3031}} {{item:3071}} {{item:3022}}. Granted, that extra 1 item was probably more of a factor than I expected, and because I ran the resolve tree for the tenacity so I missed out on Fervor.

Probably might have won if I went more damage, but I already had near 300 AD on top of AS cap though. Not salty about it, but just more aware not to underestimate them again.

I mean thats 6 items against 3.5 items

MR boots doesn't do shit to MF
and Qss gives you some ad but other then that gives you nothing against her.
While MF has 6 items that all work against you and BC and Frozen mallet is a lot of hp and PD helps a little bit and depending on the circumstances like if a lulu was right there which people tend to leave out things like that when talking on the boards it would be even worse for you.

> [{quoted}](name=Enraged Piglet,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=TQl8VxAO,comment-id=00050000,timestamp=2017-09-24T04:11:36.104+0000)
>
> I mean thats 6 items against 3.5 items
> 
> MR boots doesn't do shit to MF
> and Qss gives you some ad but other then that gives you nothing against her.
> While MF has 6 items that all work against you and BC and Frozen mallet is a lot of hp and PD helps a little bit and depending on the circumstances like if a lulu was right there which people tend to leave out things like that when talking on the boards it would be even worse for you.

No, fair 1v1 me and her alone. Both full hp, she was farming lane and I attempted an assassination. I'm not complaining about her being broken or anything, it just came as a surprise to both of us. She thought she was dead when she saw me while I thought that was a free kill. Good point about the itemisation, I never actually looked at it that way.

If you aim two cannons at each other, the first one to hit the target will usually win, take into account that mf probably has time too heal off nearby minions while you alpha strike and that meditate isn't very useful.
I'd like to see a replay of that, maybe we can piece it together and see what happened?

> [{quoted}](name=Melledoneus,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=TQl8VxAO,comment-id=00050002,timestamp=2017-09-24T23:52:42.149+0000)
>
> I'd like to see a replay of that, maybe we can piece it together and see what happened?

I got the replay, and indeed it helps to look at the situation again. Turns out I was a bit confused myself at that game I think. It was slightly earlier into the game, so the I was mistaken about the items, so the difference was actually much bigger. She hadn't finished Frozen Mallet but I also hadn't finished Black Cleaver either. She did get a bit of help in the form of  Leblanc E, but I would have died without it because she was outdamaging me by far anyway. It's the items.

But if you're interested in seeing it anyway I'll put it up here: 
https://youtu.be/tkE8maijl0Q

> [{quoted}](name=Yi Shenpai,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=TQl8VxAO,comment-id=000500020001,timestamp=2017-09-26T04:20:31.664+0000)
>
> I got the replay, and indeed it helps to look at the situation again. Turns out I was a bit confused myself at that game I think. It was slightly earlier into the game, so the I was mistaken about the items, so the difference was actually much bigger. She hadn't finished Frozen Mallet but I also hadn't finished Black Cleaver either. She did get a bit of help in the form of  Leblanc E, but I would have died without it because she was outdamaging me by far anyway. It's the items.
> 
> But if you're interested in seeing it anyway I'll put it up here: 
> https://youtu.be/tkE8maijl0Q

... Look at the item/gold discrepancy. You flat out didn't deserve to win that duel without outplaying her, and the way you ran straight at her in an open lane, well there wasn't outplaying possible. Perhaps if you tanked her W with Meditate+Q or bushjuked her you would've won.

Her W is a stronger AS steroid than your ult, as well.

Yeah, you lost that fight because of frozen mallet. Also because you didn't buy BoRK as you are generally supposed to as Yi jungle (it's even good against squishies, BTW).

But yeah, that MF lucked out and crit you quite a bit. The stars aligned for her that fight.

> [{quoted}](name=Melledoneus,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=TQl8VxAO,comment-id=0005000200010000,timestamp=2017-09-26T12:39:01.919+0000)
>
> Yeah, you lost that fight because of frozen mallet. Also because you didn't buy BoRK as you are generally supposed to as Yi jungle (it's even good against squishies, BTW).
> 
> But yeah, that MF lucked out and crit you quite a bit. The stars aligned for her that fight.

With my current setup though, BoRK overcapped my attack speed by a lot (as in, my attack speed was already capped in the video with 2 attack speed items). So in theory, it felt like a waste of gold when I could get more AD to scale Wuju Style's true damage. However, I suppose the on-hit alone might make it worth it considering I went the rageblade build.

Rageblade is useless without BoRK on Yi. Unless you're going full crit, then at that point you're overcapping anyway.

You may be the Yi main here, so I could be wrong, but if you don't build BoRK on Yi there's a serious issue. Especially when the enemy ADC is stacking HP.

> [{quoted}](name=Melledoneus,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=TQl8VxAO,comment-id=000500020001000000000000,timestamp=2017-09-26T15:10:31.301+0000)
>
> Rageblade is useless without BoRK on Yi. Unless you're going full crit, then at that point you're overcapping anyway.
> 
> You may be the Yi main here, so I could be wrong, but if you don't build BoRK on Yi there's a serious issue. Especially when the enemy ADC is stacking HP.

I was wondering about that too when I saw Cowsep also overcapping his attack speed with the stuff he buys. Maybe it's not so much about the raw stats of the item but the onhits being stacked.
Yi's AS boost on his ult is huge. That's why overcapping happens a lot.

Wanted to add one thing, on-hit Yi doesn't scale that well late game. Not saying you should lose to to adcs with that build but crit is flat out better.

Try going {{item:3072}} {{item:3031}} {{item:3087}} {{item:3508}} and you can literally perma lifesteal through their dmg if they have infinite health and u can stick up to them, but who am i kidding u'll just oneshot them.

the only time i can kill an adc is if im ahead in level and items

or if i have some sort of stealth or catch them by surprise which is basically what an assassin does
Killing an adc shouldn't rely on snowballing so hard that you become an apache attack roflcopter and just absolutely eat adc's for breakfast.
you should always be a higher level than the adc.
It is dumb you have to be higher lvl than the ADC to be able to kill them, seems like this game is balanced around this idea. if adcs go midlane, you guys would be equal, so who would win?

> [{quoted}](name=Ahris,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=TQl8VxAO,comment-id=000200010000,timestamp=2017-09-24T04:09:47.810+0000)
>
> It is dumb you have to be higher lvl than the ADC to be able to kill them, seems like this game is balanced around this idea. if adcs go midlane, you guys would be equal, so who would win?

The dude who can poke you out of lane with a ranged auto attack while still farming while the other player has to hope he can stay healthy enough to be able to actually start fighting at his power spike.

Or you just play Fizz and land an ult.

If your opponent is squishy they're dead meat.
Not in a teamfight tho {{item:3070}}
Especially in a team fight. It's a giant AoE knock up nuke for everyone.

{{item:3109}} {{item:3190}} {{champion:40}} {{champion:117}} {{champion:267}} {{champion:37}} {{champion:16}} {{summoner:3}} {{item:3107}} 

and first you need to hit the skillshot {{item:3070}}

It's not hard to hit it.

Hitting a Fizz ult in a teamfight is like hitting a Morgana Q in one. There's just so many targets it's _impossible_ to miss.

Now, you're almost certain to not hit the intended target, but you'll still hit _someone_.
Thats the problem tho, its hard to hit a target that you can actually do damage to lul
Tsss. Not hard. The tank always runs back to the ADC, anyways, carrying the Zilean/Tristana bomb, Malz E, Fizz R, Kled, or MF Q with them. Every. Goddamned. Time.

But what if you can play an assassin and an ADC?

{{champion:29}} {{champion:67}} {{champion:18}}
{{champion:133}}  *Ahem*
{{champion:236}} He's literally been played mid more in my games than he's ever been played before, regardless of whether it's on my team or the enemy team.
so your not talking about the actual bot laner but the enemy your laning against then I could see how a lucian can win lane against you and kill you and then you might have hard time killing him.
The only True assassins in the game now are {{champion:18}} {{champion:29}} {{champion:236}} {{champion:96}} and jungle {{champion:81}} lol also {{champion:31}} {{champion:59}}

I really don't understand all this bull shit, whenever I play kayn, I have 0 problems killing the adc, they aren't tanky in the slightest, kog with frozen mallet and steraks is, yeas ofcourse, he has 2 tank items, but just because ''oh vayne has a pd she is invincible'' she really isnt
if you're beating anybody with the shadow assassin form of kayne, then I think you're not seeing it because of the skill level of the people you're going up against.

> [{quoted}](name=ChuShoe,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=TQl8VxAO,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2017-09-24T02:50:38.245+0000)

ur silver 4, you're playing against worst shit than I do

https://gyazo.com/04f6cf162d7375b85b1162da016fc98d.png but my mmr is high
he never said he used shadow assassin kayne. you can build full assassin on Raast and it is still dangerous as fuck for adc's.
You don't have to understand. That's why it's called a ''circlejerk''
If you can't kill the ADC 1v1, you're either doing something wrong or are really behind (which means you're doing something wrong.)
You're doing something wrong then, I play those Assassins {{champion:119}} {{champion:29}} {{champion:15}} and I disintegrate entire enemy team's while laughing like a sadist.
Uh I think any brain dead {{champion:84}} {{champion:238}} {{champion:1}} {{champion:157}}  can ass smack a adc around pretty easily. If youre frustrated with lucian just play xin zhao.
Eh. Maybe not Yasuo. He'd need to have enough brain cells to wait for minions to walk by the ADC, _and_ he'd have to attempt to aim his Q, so he couldn't be _completely_ brain dead.

Make assassins great again!
Give them their burst speed back

> [{quoted}](name=Off The Heezy,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=TQl8VxAO,comment-id=0009,timestamp=2017-09-24T08:01:46.873+0000)
>
> Make assassins great again!
> Give them their burst speed back

agree esp ap sins need huge buffs in the form of better items to match the broken ad shit have

> [{quoted}](name=Talinis,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=TQl8VxAO,comment-id=00090000,timestamp=2017-09-24T09:14:59.116+0000)
>
> agree esp ap sins need huge buffs in the form of better items to match the broken ad shit have

There's is no broken ad assassin items. There's 1 good one, 1 okay one and 1 really shit one. There's TONS of AP itemization
On what planet? Yoummus, Duskblade, Black Cleaver, Maw... Am I forgetting any?

> [{quoted}](name=DarthFantasia,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=TQl8VxAO,comment-id=0009000000000000,timestamp=2017-09-25T18:29:44.171+0000)
>
> On what planet? Yoummus, Duskblade, Black Cleaver, Maw... Am I forgetting any?

Maw has no lethality and black cleaver is a bruiser item, hence why they took away so much damage and added so much health. Riot themselves have said black cleaver is a bruiser item.
Lethality is so broken right now.
Half of the assassins can still instakill ADCs... LeBlanc, Talon, and Fizz were really the only ones that were even touched. Zed is still a braindead instakill champ, and so are Kha and Rengar.

> [{quoted}](name=DarthFantasia,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=TQl8VxAO,comment-id=00090001,timestamp=2017-09-25T18:27:22.418+0000)
>
> Half of the assassins can still instakill ADCs... LeBlanc, Talon, and Fizz were really the only ones that were even touched. Zed is still a braindead instakill champ, and so are Kha and Rengar.

Somehow, I feel that CONDITIONAL burst make for a more healthy assassin than DELAYED burst. If the burst is delayed, you might as well be a dps champ. Rather than making the counterplay by having a window to react to the assassination, the counterplay should be the ability to avoid the assassination in the first place. K6 isolation would be a good example of this - stick with your team.

Rengar and LB on the other hand... 
{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}
